metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40477 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40477` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rar - 2:6.23-1
No subscription required

libunrar-headers - 1:6.2.10-1
libunrar5 - 1:6.2.10-1
unrar - 1:6.2.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libclamunrar package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
rar package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:6.23-1').
unrar-nonfree package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:6.2.10-1').
